website_summaries.verdict: The Vibram FiveFingers KSO EVO offers a combination of impressive ground feel and protection. It gives runners an enhanced running experience with impressive grip and flexibility. This minimalist shoe is best for runners who are looking for an affordable and lightweight road running partner.
pros: The shoe is very light and offers great ground feel based on some reviews
The upper of the KSO EVO is very breathable and flexible, as noted in some runners’ reviews
It features the XS TREK technology that provides traction, stability, comfort and durability
It has a quick lacing system
The shoe is available in an affordable price
cons: Based on some reviews, the sole is too thin and not durable
Some were complaining that the toes were too tight
Fabric wears off quickly, said some runners

customer_reviews.title: Obviously a returned product!
customer_reviews.text: The pair of Vibrams I received were obviously a return because I had two different designed shoes. The right shoe was the Kso Evo and the left shoe the Trek Ascent. Replacement arrived the next day, but unfortunately the left show had what appears to be a kink in the material which I'm sure will not only irritate me but probably rub. I've been wearing Vibram FiveFingers for years and I have a number of pairs of in various designs. I wear them most days and normally find them really comfortable. I am wondering if Vibram are using Amazon to sell seconds or returned stock. With regards to sizing, I would recommend going up a size.
customer_reviews.author: S. Hayes

customer_reviews.title: Faulty sole
customer_reviews.text: Really comfy to wear however the rubber sole has already started coming away from the fabric and has also started splitting around the big toe.
customer_reviews.author: Dave crookdake

customer_reviews.title: DIRTY! SMELLY! Very obviously not brand new and have been worn several times!!
customer_reviews.text: DIRTY! SMELLY! Very obviously not brand new and have been worn several times!! Have returned and requested a imidiate replacement! VERY DISAPPOINTED, will be my 8th pair of Vibrams purchased off Amazon and my 3rd pair of KSO EVO’s. I love the product but do not expect to be sold 2nd hand as new! Maybe this ‘try before you buy’ doesn’t work for products like this....
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: Well-built, fits as expected
customer_reviews.text: I have run in Vibrams for years, so I will not focus on comfort, etc. since that is dependent on each individual. Rather, I will say that this is the first pair of Vibrams I purchased online, and I did so after checking a couple of sizing guides. The shoes fit as expected, which is great. The shoes are also standing up to my workouts (lots of outdoors offroad running). Given the cost of these minimalist shoes, I expect them to last a while, and so far they are lasting as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Philip Dunham

customer_reviews.title: I wish I hadn't bought them
customer_reviews.text: I have wanted these types of shoes for a long time. Sadly, my feet seem to be the wrong shape for these, so that one of the shoes fits but the other is too big, and my big toes fit in the fingers, but my other toes do not, which becomes worse when you properly walk in them. They are designed for people whose toes are much straighter than mine, so that was £70 wasted for me sadly. But they might work better for you.
customer_reviews.author: Orchid Master

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: i Purchased these as a Christmas gift for my husband. They have had light use in a gym and little park runs. After only 4 months of use they are literally falling apart at the seems, and have no success in requesting an exchange! Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: S.Burke

customer_reviews.title: Great lightweighht shoe
customer_reviews.text: My lad loves these for running but now actually wears them everyday! They fit snugly and he loves the lightweight feel, this is now his 2nd pair and he's looking for more! The only downside for me is that fabric is thin and easily rips but I suppose they are not meant to be worn as an everyday shoe as my lad wears them so he is rougher with them than what they are actually marketed for.
customer_reviews.author: Eve

customer_reviews.title: Greatest barefoot shoe around!
customer_reviews.text: On my third pair of KSO EVO's. Even though these have a very thin sole, I get over 600+ miles out of these. I've used all the major barefoot running shoes and these, in my opinion are the best. Note: If you're new to barefoot running, visit the vibram website first for advise.
customer_reviews.author: L. Everitt

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and durable
customer_reviews.text: This is an eye catcher, everyone loves to look at your feet. I've jogged 10 miles with these and felt good. If you're looking to buy one, get the exact measurement of your foot and use that. For example, I usually wear 10 UK size, but my real measurement indicates that my size 9.5. Also, it's best to wash often.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Placido

customer_reviews.title: Best shoe
customer_reviews.text: The only shoe I will run in. Last pair lasted well over 1000 miles. No cushioning to degrade so I wear them until they fall apart. Even at 1k they are still okay for gardening.
customer_reviews.author: Marc Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't sure about the fit, so used Amazon Wardrobe. I usually wear EU 43 or 44, depending on the model. For these, the right fit turned out to be EU 44. I seem to have adapted quickly to the shoe -- then again, I'm used to training in my bare feet. I'm very satisfied with the product. I guess I'll have to wait and see how durable it is and all that. But very happy for now.
customer_reviews.author: Nicola

customer_reviews.title: Great product, very happy with them
customer_reviews.text: When I bought these I wasn't sure what expect. Friends of mine had raved about them but they looked weird. Well I bought and start using them, after a while you don't really care what they look like. My running form has improved. I was worried that my left knee might play up on me as it had in the past but because of the sensory feedback I can feel everything and move well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... are my first pair of Vibram FiveFingers as was recommended to use them by a PT
customer_reviews.text: These are my first pair of Vibram FiveFingers as was recommended to use them by a PT. The fit is a tad tight on the toes but other than that feel great when running on flat surfaces. Gravel not so much as the soles aren't that thick, may try Trail versions next! But they have helped my running and feels so much more comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Bradas87

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant quirky footwear not for cold days
customer_reviews.text: You need to learn how to put on the shoe so your toes go into the right bits. V comfortable v good for toes with injuries or bunions . This unusual footwear will take you through your day and your work out . Can be used for wild swimming too.
customer_reviews.author: cas Sanders

customer_reviews.title: Size fine
customer_reviews.text: Unlike other reviews, they size is perfect. I'm eu 45 or 10.5 in most shoes and the vibrams size 10.5 fits great. Perhaps a little less wiggle room than other shoes. I've had them on all day and have really enjoyed them.
customer_reviews.author: cluefunk

customer_reviews.title: Even better than I expected
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic, little tricky to get on but that’s expected. Comfortable, none slip and good fit. Did not buy for running but for indoor/outdoor exercise and qigong activities.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Great for leg day training.
customer_reviews.text: Great for leg day training! If you are looking for very flat shoes for training these are great, my 3rd pair of Vibram! Not for everyone when it comes to jogging though
customer_reviews.author: HZ

customer_reviews.title: Probably the best all-round FiveFingers model and in my opinion the most ...
customer_reviews.text: Probably the best all-round FiveFingers model and in my opinion the most comfortable in non-extreme hot/cold conditions. I wear these for everyday use, but would be perfectly fine to run in and ideal for weightlifting etc. in the gym (non-marking soles means u can wear these in gyms, indoor courts etc.)
customer_reviews.author: CB

customer_reviews.title: Get the right size
customer_reviews.text: Measure you feet as per the instructions on vibrams website, I am a uk 8 and a half - 9. I went for the 41 and they fit perfectly. I have only had them a week but I can honestly say they are the most comfortable footwear I have ever worn.
customer_reviews.author: D C Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and compact
customer_reviews.text: I love these for use at the gym. They are light and easy to pack with all of my kit and they give a great sense of freedom when you wear them. You do need to buy a size below what you usually buy like many other reviews have said and it did take me a while to get used to wearing them.
customer_reviews.author: Darrell

customer_reviews.title: Comfy Comfy Feet!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a pair of Vibrams to wear at my new job. I wear five fingers at the gym and thought if they are this comfy then they should be great during the day. They are a great pair of shoes and even if I do get the odd stare when I wear them, it makes me smile as they are the ones missing out on a great shoe
customer_reviews.author: Gary Matfin

customer_reviews.title: Good trainers normally but these ones after few weeks have already worn around the fabric area
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had for few weeks and there is a slight tear in the fabric around my toe . Will only get bigger over time. Normally buy these trainers and never had a issue this this before. Please can I have a replacement pair?
customer_reviews.author: RSD

customer_reviews.title: perfect and very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: had been training in the garden barefoot during lockdown helping to prevent a recurring achilles soreness and swelling and wanted something as close to barefoot as possible to ware ready for when I go back to the gym. These seem just right, the only thing I am left wondering is why I didn't buy a pair a lot sooner!
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: The product is very good and very flexible and the grip is fantastic but one problem is the size just a bit small and I wanted to exchange but then I need to pay 10 Euros so I couldn’t exchange, I can give 5 star but I didn’t get my size fit.
customer_reviews.author: johnson

customer_reviews.title: I love these shoes.
customer_reviews.text: These are my second pair of five-fingers shoes. I have quite a few pairs of trainers but I've stopped using them indoors since I bought these. The only snag is the time it takes to put them on because they are quite fiddly to wear.
customer_reviews.author: Lord Mamba

customer_reviews.title: Fit's great, I picked these up for gym training
customer_reviews.text: Fit's great, I picked these up for gym training. Since I've been boxing bare foot, I found my leg stability improved, so tried these for gym training, really helps improve your natural muscle adjustments. No more bulky trainers!
customer_reviews.author: Warren

customer_reviews.title: Take it slow
customer_reviews.text: Crazy looking shoes, on the box it says to take small steps first so that you get used to them, I definitely recommend you take it slow at fist because I was ignorant and injured my self running a 5min run. I class my self as being very fit but still you need to be careful with these at first until your legs build up there strength.
customer_reviews.author: Yunior

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe!
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe. Usually take size 13 but had to go down to a 10 1/2 - 11 in these shoes for a comfortable fit. Wear them with 5 finger socks. Use for training at the gym. Work ideally for this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Take it slow
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these.... It's just taking me so long to transition, my Achilles heels are hammered... Too much to soon is not good so take it easy
customer_reviews.author: Mrs R M Clark

customer_reviews.title: Great portable training 'shoes'.
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic piece of kit- nice and portable for your gym bag and great for balance with weight training. Positives, aside from health and balance benefits, are they're easily machine-washable and fast drying.
customer_reviews.author: J. Harland

customer_reviews.title: good but
customer_reviews.text: It's tiny large for my toes so it doesn't fit perfectly but it's not that bad. Also you need to wear five fingers socks as well otherwise it won't be comfortable. It can be tad difficult to fit my fingers in it
customer_reviews.author: Mohamed Ali

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes. Very pleasant to wear
customer_reviews.text: hi ! Nice shoes. Very pleasant to wear.Good feeling. Just a little bit to small...on my left foot ! So, it's very dificult to wear socks with them. May be I would have of to buy the shoes with a highter size. I live in France, Amazon uk is faster than amazon France !! Thanks. But I am not sure that it is interesting to buy on this site rather than in France because the bank charges...
customer_reviews.author: ERIC

customer_reviews.title: Love ‘em
customer_reviews.text: They’re like gloves for your feet, light, comfy, and super flexible. For general gym use they’re great I can’t recommend them enough.
customer_reviews.author: TAZ

customer_reviews.title: Love em
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes. They look good and always get stared at in the gym. The only problem is they can take some time to wear but once they're on, you won't even feel like you've got anything on.
customer_reviews.author: Lord Mamba

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: Really transformed my running. I love them. Fit as expected
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just gets better
customer_reviews.text: I have now got many pairs of Vibram five finger footwear and can’t say how comfortable they all are. Just Imagine walking bear footed and how comfortable it is, well with these you get that feeling but with the support of a trainer.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: As usual fit like a glove
customer_reviews.text: Love five fingers as a brand 3rd pair in 6 years always wear them for the gym great for deads squats and plyo work .
customer_reviews.author: Lee John Barber

customer_reviews.title: WILDLY too expensive. Worth about 35 max
customer_reviews.text: way too expensive but interesting force you to walk or run lightly on the balls of your feet good connection for leg press machines at the gym too
customer_reviews.author: N E Body

customer_reviews.title: So so comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Love 'em! - Took some getting used to for both putting them on; but also adjusting to running in them. Slowly building up my distance in them. Also great for just knocking around the house or garden.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. M. M. Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my partner, he is so pleased with them
customer_reviews.author: kerry anne mc daid

customer_reviews.title: Too big
customer_reviews.text: These are great... the only problem is that the sizing is very hard to get right, and by the time you realise they're too big the order window has closed. Order smaller than you think you need - and by the way, they are absolutely not in any sense waterproof.
customer_reviews.author: Sam M.

customer_reviews.title: Good solid Vibram shoe applicable for the gym and all purposes
customer_reviews.text: I have about 8 pairs of Vibrams for various purposes - this is one of the best I have! Good construction, feel and fit. I am happy wearing them to work, on the underground, to parties and even the Gym! etc. I love them! I will be buying this style these again...
customer_reviews.author: shaunnick

customer_reviews.title: don't buy it - ripped quickly
customer_reviews.text: broke after wearing it merely 8 or 10 times. My last pair lasted me for years and didn't fail. This one the toes ripped quickly and the sole wears so fast. Don't buy it!
customer_reviews.author: Olaf

customer_reviews.title: Great fit and feel
customer_reviews.text: The item arrived in time as expected. Unfortunately it had a small tear in the material. It was replaced without fuss and quickly. Replacement pair are great and feel and fit well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Just great, so much fun to walk and run with these.
customer_reviews.author: Emanuel

customer_reviews.title: Gorilla feet!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these for our son at Christmas, he said they are amazing and so comfortable. Lots of people have asked him where they can purchase a pair.
customer_reviews.author: NinaG

customer_reviews.title: Comfy, but get your sizing right.
customer_reviews.text: For the first couple of weeks I experienced a slight amount of rubbing on two of my toes, but they soon callused up. I rarely run in anything else. Each pair has lasted me approx. 18 months with daily use, so not the most economical, but worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent shoes
customer_reviews.text: Had these for awhile now, took some getting used to as they say, but now looking at doing my first half marathon in October in these as I've never felt better running! Just a little tip though, check Cuban's website for size guide and do it exactly as they say, I'm normally a 10 and their website said I was an 8, was tempted to go for a 9 but thought better of it and stuck with what they recommended and the 8's were a perfect fit.
customer_reviews.author: Billy

customer_reviews.title: Fit well
customer_reviews.text: Well made, would use for CrossFit/casual fitness and callisthenics, not for running as don’t appear to have strength for intense workouts
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Just buy it damn
customer_reviews.text: Men/women these are THE BEST, I just got them, tried them on, so f... N comfortable...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: European to UK and US sizes but also gender spicific
customer_reviews.text: Theses are great just make sure you check and double check the sizes they are different from mens and womens fit shoes, check that the size you ordered is the size dispatched.
customer_reviews.author: DRQ

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: After having first one's replaced the 2nd pair are perfect & a much better fit. Thankyou Amazon for prompt service Look forward to ordering more items from you😊😊
customer_reviews.author: Mr R Vincent

customer_reviews.title: Great item if you don’t mind not walking on a ...
customer_reviews.text: Complete control of the foot-to-ground traction yet no discomfort of barefoot walking/running. Great item if you don’t mind not walking on a cousin.
customer_reviews.author: Regular Shopper - Upfront Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: there nice and comfortable and will do me foor my needs ...
customer_reviews.text: there nice and comfortable and will do me foor my needs but do take getting used to but would by again but the running shoe style as it has a thicker sole
customer_reviews.author: stuart spilling

customer_reviews.title: Supporting foot health
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased the Vibram 5 fingers less for running, and more for tackling a degree of probation in both ankles. I have taken notice of advice that I need to train my feet into wearing the shoe, so have not worn them that much yet. But what I have experienced so far I am very pleased with them.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Smith

customer_reviews.title: Awesome shoes
customer_reviews.text: Really amazing shoes, this is my 3rd pair from Vibram. Exact model like this lasted me 2 years of active sports.
customer_reviews.author: Yuliya

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent shoes. Great feel with the floor. Best for indoor activities due to the thin sole.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Lee

customer_reviews.title: Better than Vivo
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are so much better than Vivo Primus in my opinion. The sole is more flexible so you feel more barefoot.
customer_reviews.author: Phil W.

customer_reviews.title: quite expensive and very strange to get on to start with but they are brilliant to wear
customer_reviews.text: arrived early, quite expensive and very strange to get on to start with but they are brilliant to wear, well pleased
customer_reviews.author: Hiker 10

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with these fitness shoes for indoor workouts
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with these fitness shoes for indoor workouts. Can be awkward to get toes in but I guess it's horses for courses. I'm sure I'll get the knack.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs T.

customer_reviews.title: BUILD UP SLOWLY
customer_reviews.text: Replacement for a pair I'd worn out. Nothing to add to previous reviews except to emphasise that if you're new to minimalist running, build up slowly. Your going to ask you calves to act as shock absorbers and they'll take time to build strength.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. S. J. Doyle

customer_reviews.title: Best shoes ever.
customer_reviews.text: My third pair of five fingers, but first kso. They are my favourite now. Always get strange looks off people, and the odd comment - that adds to the fun I guess. The most comfortable shoe I own, it is really like walking barefoot.
customer_reviews.author: LeeD

customer_reviews.title: Good Product. Gives the barefoot feel
customer_reviews.text: Good Product. Gives the barefoot feel. The laces are not great, tightening them is difficult. No issues of smell etc. Dries quickly if wet. Protects the feet well.
customer_reviews.author: PP

customer_reviews.title: Space for big toe too small
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes but they will only fit if your toes are of a very similar size
customer_reviews.author: Nigel O'Donoghue

customer_reviews.title: problem with tight shoes this is the anwser for sorting ...
customer_reviews.text: problem with tight shoes this is the anwser for sorting out your feet . not just for fashion this has helped me allot
customer_reviews.author: Imtiaz Mohammed

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: I love these so much. Got 2 pairs now which I rotate. Wear them every day. They look a bit strange and will get some comments but to be honest they just feel so good to wear I don’t care
customer_reviews.author: paul smith

customer_reviews.title: very comfortable, great for my workouts
customer_reviews.text: Always wanted a pair of these, very comfortable, great for my workouts.
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent! My partner loves them, it was an early Christmas present. Great price and very comfortable. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent pair of runners and have helped a lot with my feet problems
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Sooooo Good!!!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! Comfy and like working out in soft bare feet!! Ace for squats!!
customer_reviews.author: Rockstaal

customer_reviews.title: Check size before ordering
customer_reviews.text: That fitted as expected but only because I checked the size needed before I ordered - they come up very big so check before you order.
customer_reviews.author: Claire

customer_reviews.title: Get them
customer_reviews.text: My second pair of vibrams and the best so far. My job requires that I do a lot of standing around and these shoes not only help the foot to build the muscles for purpose but also make the process comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: He thinks they are amazing.
customer_reviews.text: My husband bought these (to my horror) and raves about them to everyone. He thinks they are amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Rachael Em

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great in every sense. The only catch - hard to clean and they stink up fast.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: These are by far the most comfortable so far
customer_reviews.text: Have quite a few different pairs of cinemas at this point. These are by far the most comfortable so far! I thought they were going to be a little tight when I first put them on. But they seemed to stretch out a little after an hour or so breaking in to be the perfect fit
customer_reviews.author: Brendan O'Halloran

customer_reviews.title: durability around toes on previous pair was very poor, developed holes after 10-15 miles
customer_reviews.text: Too small and wrong colour had to return, durability around toes on previous pair was very poor, developed holes after 10-15 miles, so no more for me.
customer_reviews.author: Mark hewitt

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: i just wore the shoes and i felt that i had never used my feet before.
customer_reviews.author: Adri

customer_reviews.title: happy feet
customer_reviews.text: Hi only reason i gave 4 stars was because i had to send them back because they were a little small and my 3rd toes were pressing against the end of the toe socket. A shame because i love these and will be getting another pair as soon as I have my refund.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: It seems very good made and they fit grate. I love feeling in them its fantastic. I recomended
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really good purchase
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my son to run in a charity run. They arrived within two days. Fit well and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love em, much better alternative to flip flops for on the beach.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Lumley

customer_reviews.title: For trekking and light workout, if you love both comfort and sensitivity
customer_reviews.text: I normally wear 43 EU, same size I bought. I suppose I could easily wear a 42 EU as well. The shoe is not loose though, great product!
customer_reviews.author: Massimo

customer_reviews.title: S  U  P  E R !
customer_reviews.text: Arrived 5 days earlier! No problem Im New Balance Minimus guy and those babies made my day running. Hope they last!!!
customer_reviews.author: themis

customer_reviews.title: Feeling like an animal
customer_reviews.text: Amazing shoes! Ground me like a monkey. As I'm so Ego driven this is good for me. More in touch with the chimp in me. Woohoohahahehe!
customer_reviews.author: Doug Sharp

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable on smaller toes
customer_reviews.text: Very uncomfortable on smaller toes and pull cord very stiff
customer_reviews.author: Shipppers

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product The only down its the time to put them on but once you get it sorted u can feel how comfortable and particle the shoes are.

customer_reviews.title: Get socks to go with them
customer_reviews.text: These are so comfy on first fit! :-) feels bit strange but very comfy

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Great fit, high quality, perfect for people wanting to spend more time out of big spongy trainers. Great additional tool to help us all reclaim our foot movement and strength.
customer_reviews.author: Andy R.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair and I love them.arrived quickly and fit great.

customer_reviews.title: Great product from Vibram
customer_reviews.text: Great product from Vibram. Really comfortable but get takes some time to get use to the fit and feel.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality product !!
customer_reviews.text: Had these before so I know they fit perfect and suit the training I do also.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Broadbent

customer_reviews.title: Pull the trigger
customer_reviews.text: Switch to these, learn to run properly and you’ll never regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Will H.

customer_reviews.title: The same as it was on the picture.
customer_reviews.text: This is the shoes I was excepted. That's why I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Jean louis

customer_reviews.title: Amazing shoes. I run about a 1000km in every ...
customer_reviews.text: Amazing shoes. I run about a 1000km in every pair. I have had 3 different pairs and I absolutely love them!
customer_reviews.author: Peter Klesken

customer_reviews.title: Sizing
customer_reviews.text: Happy with purchase. Many thanks for comments which guided sizing etc
customer_reviews.author: Mike Ford

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: my second pair in 7 years. I hope these last as long as my first pair
customer_reviews.author: Exmonkey

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes but only good for indoor exercise , enjoy wearing them
customer_reviews.author: Kevin griffin

customer_reviews.title: Size does matter
customer_reviews.text: Great looking foot ware but you’re better off ordering a size bigger than your use to
customer_reviews.author: Dean

customer_reviews.title: fits perfect; soft to wear and walking in them
customer_reviews.text: They are the same size as normal shoes. fits perfect; soft to wear and walking in them; shoes are also warm and there is no need to have socks on your feats. how long they will last is hard to say, but lets be optimistic.
customer_reviews.author: igor kaligaric

customer_reviews.title: Fit great, feel great
customer_reviews.text: Fit great, feel great. Only just received and wearing for for first time. Early impressions feels like they should live up to all the positive reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Vibram FiveFingers Men's KSO Evo Multisport Indoor Shoes
product_meta.description: The ideal combination of ground feedbackand protection, the kso evo allows wearersto experience terrain with great grip andflexibility. Less than 5mm, the thin soleencourages good form while still durableenough to absorb shock.
